医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
关于克兰费尔特综合征和男性不育症的新见解想象一下无数渴望成为父亲的男人的深深挫败感，却因为无法控制的遗传状况而面临不孕症。对于那些患有克兰费尔特综合症的人来说，这种痛苦的现实是一场持续不断的斗争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/New-insights-into-Klinefelter-syndrome-and-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/New-insights-into-Klinefelter-syndrome-and-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39234004-0479-4b71-8803-f51b13ef3809 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 13:04:23 -0500 New insights into Klinefelter syndrome and male infertility
研究强调 Medicare Advantage 中的牙科福利不足Medicare Advantage——医疗保险的私有化形式，提供传统 Medicare 之外的福利，例如牙科保险——越来越受欢迎，但一项新的分析显示，Medicare Advantage 提供的牙科保险质量很差，只有 8.4%计划提供符合研究质量标准的牙科福利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Research-highlights-inadequate-dental-benefits-in-Medicare-Advantage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Research-highlights-inadequate-dental-benefits-in-Medicare-Advantage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14ef8338-f9a7-4e4a-910f-1f1c75275f92 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 12:09:40 -0500 Research highlights inadequate dental benefits in Medicare Advantage
富含硫蔬菜烹饪中不饱和脂肪酸的反式异构化反式脂肪酸（TFA）是心血管疾病的主要原因。这些有害脂肪会沿着动脉壁积聚，限制血液流动并增加心脏病发作的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Trans-isomerization-of-不饱和-fatty-acids-in-cooking-with-sulfur-rich-vegetables.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Trans-isomerization-of-不饱和-fatty-acids-in-cooking-with-sulfur-rich-vegetables.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1ccb98c-bb01-4044-9d7f-5adf856f36f8 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 12:00:07 -0500 Trans-isomerization of unsaturated fatty acids in cooking with sulfur-rich vegetables
激光纹理支架为血管疾病提供了有前景的解决方案由韩国科学技术院（KIST，院长 Oh Sang-Rok）生物材料研究中心的 Hojeong Jeon 博士和 Hyung-Seop Han 博士领导的研究小组，以及 KIST 欧洲的 Indong Jun 博士，开发了一种利用激光图案化的新型支架表面处理技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Laser-textured-stents-offer-promising-solution-for-angio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Laser-textured-stents-offer-promising-solution-for-angio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ce7d709-e17c-4439-93a6-b52de8053470 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 08:00:00 -0500 Laser-textured stents offer promising solution for vascular diseases
新方法允许对鱼牙齿进行无损研究我们能否在不伤害活鱼和其他脊椎动物的情况下，反复详细检查它们的牙齿？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/New-method-allows-non-pressive-study-of-fish-teeth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/New-method-allows-non-pressive-study-of-fish-teeth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08c50d4f-5f34-40a2-826e-a2952653af69 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 07:48:55 -0500 New method allows non-destructive study of fish teeth
免疫细胞中核酸传感器和酶之间复杂的相互作用得到解释根据最近的一项研究，腺苷脱氨酶 2 (ADA2) 已被确定为 Toll 样受体 9 (TLR9​​) 响应核酸激活的调节因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Complex-interactions- Between-nucleic-acid-sensors-and-enzymes-in-immune-cells-explained.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Complex-interactions- Between-nucleic-acid-sensors-and-enzymes-in-immune-cells-explained.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df5a22cf-7211-4a92-81eb-0d9bdd15161a Thu, 26 Dec 2024 07:36:26 -0500 Complex interactions between nucleic acid sensors and enzymes in immune cells explained
果蝇窃取细菌防御以生存寄生黄蜂在寄生虫与其宿主之间持续不断的军备竞赛中，创新被认为是成功攻击或防御的关键，从而在竞争中脱颖而出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Fruit-flies-steal-bacterial-defense-to-survive-parasitic-wasps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Fruit-flies-steal-bacterial-defense-to-survive-parasitic-wasps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbb18130-ee8d-4d94-83f1-0d2bb6ba7b1b Tue, 24 Dec 2024 21:52:01 -0500 Fruit flies steal bacterial defense to survive parasitic wasps
欧洲内分泌学会宣布 2025 年首个世界激素日经过三年成功地通过欧洲激素日提高人们对良好激素健康重要性的认识，欧洲内分泌学会 (ESE) 和欧洲激素和代谢基金会 (ESE 基金会) 宣布将有史以来第一个世界激素日定为世界激素日。地点：2025 年 4 月 24 日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/European-Society-of-Endocrinology-announces-first-ever-World-Hormone-Day-in-2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/European-Society-of-Endocrinology-announces-first-ever-World-Hormone-Day-in-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d319dfc-1c81-4436-901b-db1a29fb046c Tue, 24 Dec 2024 21:46:35 -0500 European Society of Endocrinology announces first-ever World Hormone Day in 2025
可穿戴心音设备改变心血管疾病监测心血管疾病仍然是全球健康危机，迫切需要能够实现早期检测和有效治疗的创新诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Wearable-heart-sound-devices-transform-cardioangio-disease-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Wearable-heart-sound-devices-transform-cardioangio-disease-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=484fc64b-fca9-46cc-b092-0e659b0e5478 Tue, 24 Dec 2024 21:39:18 -0500 Wearable heart sound devices transform cardiovascular disease monitoring
创新技术将成纤维细胞转化为功能性心肌细胞心血管疾病仍然是全球主要死亡原因，每年夺去数百万人的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Innovative-technique-converts-太多成纤维细胞-into-功能性-cardiomy cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Innovative-technique-converts-fascinated-into-function-cardiomyologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bdc9fb5-1489-4211-b3b9-17d2cefd0108 Tue, 24 Dec 2024 21:34:05 -0500 Innovative technique converts fibroblasts into functional cardiomyocytes
